attributes.action: make St George's Day an official Bank Holiday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the Irish have St Patrick's Day, and the Scots have St David's day, why can't the English have St George's Day as a bank holiday? We should also be recognising our patron Saint!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "make St George's Day an official Bank Holiday."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20819
